sqlMap.statement: SELECT VST.FSR_NUM ,VST.SVC_TASK_NUM ,FSR.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK FROM FSR_VISIT VST ,SVC_TASK TSK ,FSR FSR WHERE VST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND VST.FSR_VISIT_STS_CD = #fsrVisitStsCd# AND VST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND VST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TSK.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND VST.SVC_TASK_NUM = TSK.SVC_TASK_NUM AND TSK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND VST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FSR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND VST.FSR_NUM = FSR.FSR_NUM AND FSR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ( FSR.EZUPTIME <= #ezUptime# OR VST.EZUPTIME <= #ezUptime# OR TSK.EZUPTIME <= #ezUptime# ) ORDER BY VST.FSR_NUM ,VST.SVC_TASK_NUM
